summary: 2 new swords to ebony smithing catagory
descriptionHtml:
EBONY SMITHING 
SEE LAST 2 IMAGES, dont use the exact consle code as mine because we have different load orders

Demon knight Greatsword
Demon knight short sword

Both have similar damage to vinilla ebony weapons slightly higher critical damage.

The desings are made from a concept found on the internet, i researched and found no real conflict with copyright so i decided to upload my version of the weapons as the shape is the almost the same but the textures are completly different. but if this mod is requested to be taken down it will be removed promptly.
[youtube]K0obozGMrvw[/youtube]
[youtube]Ja-Qe_XJ_Os[/youtube]
Anyways Enjoy the weapons
